name: Thors Guidance
description:
Built in 1 week for the Brackeys 2021 Game Jam.
Theme of "Let There be Chaos".

Guide your subjects to the safety of their castle. Prevent them from drowning with "carefully" placed lightning strikes and fires of "encouragement". Not everyone will survive - its tough being a god of lightning.

Credit:

Programming: Samuel Wortley Sage

Design: Samuel Wortley Sage

Art: Aleksandr Markarov's Heroic Asset's & Samuel Wortley Sage

Audio: Imphenzia's Universal Sound FX & Abstraction's Three Red Heart Music
